item.title: ‘Him’ Star Marlon Wayans on Sports, Success and Sacrifice: ‘Everybody Wants to Be Great, and Everyone Is Willing to Sacrifice Up to a Point’
item.description: Donning jerseys, foam fingers and face paint, rowdy fans of the fictitious San Antonio Saviors football team lined Hollywood Boulevard in front of Grauman’s Chinese Theater on Sept. 17, intermit
